content: Regular Shares Savings Plans (RSS) ETF Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 15 Jan 2019When is the best time to invest in RSS in an ETF? During Bull or Bear market? Or interest rate is going higher? Or when Trump decides to build another wall?Seriously though! Just wanted to get some thoughts from the community here :)1 answerAnswerBump0

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 16 Jan 2019Just buy consistently every month without thinking about so many things. Its called dollar cost averaging (DCA). Just hold on to it even if it goes down.0 comments0
